title: 'Ein-Shadud
description: Small settlement in the Jezreel Valley containing structures dated to the Early Bronze Age I. Salvage excavations were conducted on the site in 1979 prior to its destruction by construction.

properties.description: Point representing the approximate location of the 'Ein-Shadud site prior to its destruction by modern construction, derived from an OpenStreetMap Node after Bruan 1985.
properties.title: OSM location of 'Ein-Shadud
